experience: You and Narinder both know Whitney Belker Vauvelle
Startups + Technology Companies + Government + Music Platform
Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Japan, China, India, Canada, USA, Finland, UK

-Travelling extensively & seeking out Talented Individuals, Teams, & Organisations.- Currently in Fukuoka Japan :* Exploring Startup Ecosystem & Evaluating Business Incorporation options* Identifying Co-founders/Management Team/Music Market* Currently prototyping Music Platform App - Mobile/Web * Exploring relevant Business & Consulting opportunities

- Founder of Juzz Group.* Conceptualised & Designed the JuzzMusic product & launched it on the Apple App store on 13th February 2013. https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/juzzmusic/id572346789?ls=1&mt=8* Product was featured by  Apple in 67 countries under various categories including Best New Product, Editors Pick etc. under the Music classification.* I had to take a hard, painful, but logical decision to take the product offline & wind up the company in January/2014. Although the product was highly innovative & broke new ground across technical & music industry norms, the product failed to meet the necessary vision & a complete rebuild was necessary.* A costly & painful lesson for sure, one from which much was learnt.

- Having exited my previous Startup through a Trade Sale, & with the birth of my only child, I decided to significantly reduce my workload & commercial engagements, so as to focus on my family - Special Interest Projects & Research, which include :* Project Financing* Education Consultancy* Portal Development* Business & Strategy Advisory* Research on an extensive range of Technologies, Business Models, Products, & Services

- JadeLite was Focused on developing proprietary cutting edge Software Products that automated the business processes within the Education & Training sectors. * Sold the business in 2007. * APICTA top prize winner.* Conceptualised the products & business, & grew customer size revenue from US$20,000 for our first deployment, to US$4 million for our largest account.* Customer Base included : Governments + MNCs + Mid to Large Education/Training/Certification Bodies, & Multi Campus/Schools.* Early adopters of .NET Framework - Fully Web Based & Hybrid options.- EduCampus : ERPx for Education - EduCorp : Performance Appraisal & Training Management- EduLas : Licensing, Assessment, & Scheduling *Products were integrated with SAP & Oracle - Financials & HR, as well as custom built options.
Critical Path / Netstar Networks / iSoftel / Sunrise (Yonex & Mikasa)

Below is a brief of my prior career successes.++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++- Critical Path Inc. : ICT Sector - (Temp Role - approx: 2 months)* Reporting to Vice President, Asia Pacific* Marketing Consultancy.++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++- NetStar Networks : Networks & Systems Integrator - (1+ year)* Reporting to Managing Director (South East Asia)* Recruited to replace the General Manager* Led the Sales & Marketing Department for South East Asia.++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++- iSoftel  : Prepaid & Postpaid Telecommunications Software (1+ year)* Reporting to Executive Vice President & CEO* Recruited to lead the Marketing Department, and Developed & Implemented Pre-IPO Strategic Marketing Plan for Asia.++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++- Sunrise & Co : Yonex & Mikasa Sports Brands - (1+ year)* Reporting to Managing Director* Recruited to lead the Marketing Department* Led the Marketing Department as well as Brand Ambassador/Representative for Yonex & Mikasa for South East Asia.

summary: With 15 + years of successful Innovative Leadership experience, Narinder (Sunny), is an Award Winning Business and Technology professional with an exceptional track record for delivering tangible results across organisations at different stages - from Startup's, Pre and Post IPO's, to MNCs.Having led teams and organizations in the capacities of Sales, Marketing, General Management, and CEO, across various sectors globally, he has acquired a broad and in-depth understanding for Technology and Business Processes, and is hardwired to re-engineer them and deliver Innovative, Ground Breaking products and solutions that have the potential to be truly Disruptive.Fuelled by his his aptitude, acumen, and positive attitude, coupled by his passion to learn & take on ever increasing challenges, he has lived & worked across Asia, North America, & Europe, and has developed a deep understanding of commercial, cultural, and ethical nuances, in conducting business at all levels, & building robust relationships globally.As a firm believer that ‘Technology can Make the World a Better Place’, his Buzzwords include :VIABLE TEAMS = Learn + Innovate + Proactive + Productive + Responsible + Accountable + Domain Experts + Self-Motivated + Exceed KPIs + Ethics DISRUPTIVE FUNCTIONAL PLATFORMS = Market Niche + Content + Communications + Commerce + Integrated/Unified Platform + Ease of Use EQUALISATION PLATFORMS =Level Access and Opportunity for All Stakeholders + Serving Needs & Wants + EthicsTECH INTERESTS  = AI + XR + IoT + FinTech + DLT + LBS + BPA + Cloud Computing + Cybersecurity + Big Data + BI + Mobile/Web/Server/DB Architecture + UI/UX + Agile + Rapid Prototyping + PoC/PoVSECTOR INTERESTS = Media and Entertainment + Sports + Education + eGovernment +  Gaming + Ad Tech, eCommerce
